name: SIS TURNS 7!
description:
SIS IS TURNING SEVEN, and you’re Invited to celebrate! 
Ladies, in November of 2017 we had our very first football session for 17 women, and look at us today! We’re turning SEVEN years old, with almost 10,000 community members across India! Thank YOU for being a part of this community and helping it become a MOVEMENT! We’re SO PROUD, and we want to celebrate with YOU! 
We’ve opened 100 spots for a memorable evening together! 
• First round of alcohol FREE (IMFL cocktails/beer/wine) 
• A round of pass-around snacks on the house! 
• 25% off on all subsequent food and drinks 
*T&Cs apply 
Please note that this is a WOMEN'S ONLY event! 
You really don’t wanna miss this! See you there Sister!

location.name: Hard Rock Cafe
location.address: 40,  St Mark's Rd,  Shanthala Nagar,  Ashok Nagar,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560001

name: Sweat Fest- EARLY BIRD
description:
Get set Ladies!! The SIS Anniversary Month edition of our much awaited Sweat Fest is HERE and all set to take off! 
What exactly is the Sweat Fest? 
We’re bringing 3 different workout formats to you! So get ready to have a smashing 2 hour workout through mini experiences of our standout fitness formats Yoga > HIIT > Dance in this crazy sweat dripping party! All of this packaged in a fun-filled Sunday morning with music, a wellness market and refreshments from our brand partners! 
Registration time is 7.45 am. 
 
EVENT DETAILS 
1. Date: 1st December 2024, Sunday 
2. Time: 8 am-12 pm 
3. Venue: WeWork Galaxy, Ashok Nagar 
4. The 3 formats for the workout: Yoga, HIIT and Dance. 
 
Workout flow: Each workout will be for 30-40 mins each and will take place one after the other. You will be given a break between each session to get ready for the next. 
Apart from the workout, as mentioned we will have music, some super cool brands and prizes for you ladies to have the experience of the best ever fest!!​ 
We are absolutely STOKED and extremely EXCITED to bring this event to you ladies!! We can't wait for you to experience this with us! What are you waiting for then?! SIGN UP and JOIN US! 
*Please bring a yoga mat & a water bottle! 
Reach out to Saachi (+919513334690) for any queries!

name: Footy Gamenight with the Sisters and Misters
description:
Hey Sisters and Misters  
These game nights are 90 minutes of complete game time. It will be a 5v5 game with substitutes. The reason we are doing this is to give you amazing women more match-based experience in football and to have high-intensity games, which definitely improves that! 
Please note that you must have some prior experience with the basics of football.  
Join us! It's going to be a blast! 
Aishwarya Bharathi 
9738012622

name: B'ball game night with the Sisters and Misters
url: https://sistersinsweat.in/session_details/basketball/Bball Gameday with the Sisters and Misters
description:
BBALL WITH THE SISTERS and MISTERS   
Hey Ladies! 
We are introducing Basketball game nights to our session offerings. These game nights are of complete game time with 4 Quarters. It will be a 5v5 full Court game with substitutes and a mixed-format game, which means there will be men joining in for these as well. The reason we are doing this is to give you amazing women more match-based experience in basketball and to have high-intensity games, definitely improves that! 
Please note that you must have prior experience with the basics of Basketball. These game nights are not for beginners. 
Please note that this is only for women to book, the men's bookings will be taken through a closed WhatsApp group. 
Join us, ladies! It's going to be a blast! 
Contact:  
Aishwarya Bharathi 
9738012622

name: B'Ball with the Sisters - Beginners and Intermediate
description:
Hey Ladies! Get ready to play some BBall with us! 
 
Location : St. Joseph's Arts And Science College Time : 7:30-9:00pm Day : Wednesdays 
 
These sessions are open to all women at the Beginner level of the sport! The basketball drills will be designed to both push you and at the same time, build on your basics! Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm-up, basketball drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end. It is a super fun activity to add to your day and apart from that, even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to basketball shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play! Sign up and join us ladies!! 
 
Contact: 
Vibha 
8073681373

location.name: St. Joseph's Arts And Science College
location.address: #36,  Langford Rd,  opposite Axis Bank ATM,  Bheemanna Garden,  Langford Gardens,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560027

name: Pickleball with the Sisters (GoRally x SIS)
description:
LADIES! 
We have something new planned for you! 
Come try a new and easy to learn sport with us! 
Pickleball is one of the fastest growing sports in the world and we are here to help you learn! 
 
These sessions are 'Play-Only' sessions. No coaching involved. Pickleball is a very easy sport to pick-up and play, there’s hardly a need for coaching beyond the basics. However, there will be experts at the facility that can guide you, if you require. 
 
There are 2 courts booked for this session, and it's 4 people active at one court at a time.  
 
These sessions are only One-Hour long, so we recommend arriving 15minutes early to finish up your warm-up and to maximise the one-hour. 
 
Some points to note: 
* Paddle & ball (equipment) will be available at the venue and is included in the cost of the workshop and sessions 
* Wear training/sports shoes, not running shoes. Running shoes have a taller sole profile, built for uni-directional movement only, while the sole profile of training/sports shoes are closer to the ground and are built for multi-directional movement 
* The venue has a cute F&B counter, in case you'd like some refreshments 
* ⁠The venue has clean washrooms for women, equipped with a shower, hair dryer etc 
* ⁠Parking is available at the venue 
 
Enjoy this new sport Sister! 
 
Any issues, please contact:  
Tanvie: 8800199418

name: Footy with the Sisters - Intermediate - Ulsoor
description:
FOOTY WITH THE SISTERS - INTERMEDIATE SESSIONS 
Bring out those football boots or shoes and remember to clean 'em nice! We're getting on the field to play the Beautiful game! 
This will be full 90mins session consisting of a warmup, technical ball drills, gametime and cool down. Since this is an intermediate level session, it is necessary that you have a bit of prior experience playing Football. Not recommended for complete beginners. 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to football studs/turf shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play :) 
See you on the field Sisters!! 
 
Contact: Samara 
9902082782 
Vibha  
8073681373

name: B'Ball with the Sisters - Intermediate
description:
BBALL WITH THE SISTERS - FRIDAY - INTERMEDIATE SESSIONS: 
Bring out those kicks and get your bounce on, we're getting out on the court to play some BALL !! 
These sessions are open to all women at the intermediate level! The basketball drills will be designed to both push you and at the same time, build on your existing basics! A bit of prior playing experience is required, not recommended for beginners. Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm-up, basketball drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end. It is a super fun start to your day and apart from that, even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to basketball shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play :) See you on the field Sisters!! 
 
Contact: Aishwary 9738012622

name: Baddy with the Sisters - Saturday
description:
Bring out your Racquets ladies!! We're going to play some badminton! 
Details : Day - Saturday Location - PlayZone Indiranagar  
What do I do if I don't have a racquet and non-marking shoes?  Racquets and non-marking shoes are mandatory, but if you don't have them the court offers them for rent at the following costs. - Racquet - Rs.30 per hour - Non-marking shoes - Rs.30 per hour. 
We're super excited! Join us and we'll see you on the court. 
For any further queries, please feel free to reach out to us. 
 
Contact: 
Aishwarya Bharathi 
9738012622

name: Run with the Sisters
description:
SIS Run Club @Cubbon park 
Meeting Point:  
We meet at Cafe Coffee Day square at 6:50am, and walk to the spot inside Cubbon Park 
 
Read further for the details of the run! 
1. Distance : 3km & 5km 
2. Level : Open to all including beginners 
3. Reporting time : 6:45am 
4. Reporting point : We meet at Cafe Coffee Day square at 6:45am, and walk to the spot inside Cubbon Park 
 5. Run venue : Cubbon park  
6. Things to carry : Water bottle and a few buckets of enthusiasm! 
7. Format : Warm-up, Run, Cool down. 
Please note that you will have an expert pacer guiding you through the entire session from start to finish!  
Let's get those running shoes on ladies!! Sign-up and join us now! 
 
Contact: 
Aishwarya Bharathi 
9738012622
